import { useState } from "react"; function BoardWrite() { const [title, setTitle] = useState(""); const [writer, setWriter] = useState(""); const [contents, setContents] = useState(""); const onChange = (e) => { switch (e.target.id) { case title: setTitle(e.target.value); break; case writer: contents(e.target.value); break; case title: setContents(e.target.value); break; } }; return (
